snippet: In a salary-cap move Thursday, the Denver Broncos released Champ Bailey, the team’s defensive leader, who has made eight Pro Bowls since 2004.
abstract: Denver Broncos release Champ Bailey, who has made eight Pro Bowls since he was acquired in a trade; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: In a salary-cap move Thursday, the Denver Broncos released Champ Bailey, the team’s defensive leader, who has made eight Pro Bowls since 2004.
